entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is the nephew of Harry and is on a diet. He has been given a large grapefruit quarter as part of his new diet.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story and is also on a diet with his family. He receives a smaller grapefruit quarter compared to Dudley.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Harry's aunt and is trying to keep up Dudley's morale by making sure he gets more food than Harry.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's uncle and refers to healthy foods as 'rabbit food'.

relationships.description: Aunt Petunia tries to keep up Dudley's morale by making sure he gets more food than Harry.
Uncle Vernon refers to healthy foods as 'rabbit food'.
